dcterms:creator: Da Li
Yongxin Yang
Yi-Zhe Song
Timothy M. Hospedales
dcterms:description: PACS contains 9,991 images with 7 classes and 4 domains, i.e., Photo, Art painting, Cartoon, and Sketch. It is regarded as the most commonly used DG dataset, which includes significant distribution discrepancies across domains.
dcterms:title: PACS

dcterms:creator: Lei Li
Ke Gao
Juan Cao
Ziyao Huang
Yepeng Weng
Xiaoyue Mi
Zhengze Yu
Xiaoya Li
Boyang Xia
dcterms:description: VLCS consists of 10,729 images, including 5 classes and 4 domains, i.e., Caltech-101, LabelME, PASCAL VOC 2007, and Sun09. The official split of VLCS is adopted in experiments for a fair comparison.
dcterms:title: VLCS

dcterms:creator: Fabio Maria Carlucci
Antonio Dâ€™Innocente
Silvia Bucci
Barbara Caputo
Tatiana Tommasi
dcterms:description: Office-Home contains around 15,500 images, covering 65 categories and 4 domains, i.e., Artistic, Clipart, Product, and Real-World. It is challenging in DG tasks due to its larger number of classes.
dcterms:title: Office-Home

dcterms:creator: Kaiyang Zhou
Yongxin Yang
Timothy M. Hospedales
Tao Xiang
dcterms:description: Digits-DG is a combination of four handwritten digit recognition datasets, i.e., MNIST, MNIST-M, SVHN, and SYN, with domain shift mainly in font style, stroke color, and background.
dcterms:title: Digits-DG

dcterms:creator: Sara Beery
Grant Van Horn
Pietro Perona
dcterms:description: TerraIncognita focuses on recognition in unknown environments, providing a dataset that includes various terrains and conditions.
dcterms:title: TerraIncognita

dcterms:creator: Xingchao Peng
Qinxun Bai
Xide Xia
Zijun Huang
Kate Saenko
Bo Wang
dcterms:description: DomainNet is a large-scale dataset for domain adaptation and generalization, consisting of multiple domains with diverse visual concepts.
dcterms:title: DomainNet
